intro.title: Geography Quiz
intro.description: Test your geography knowledge with this capital cities quiz

questions.question: Budapest is the capital of which state?

answers.alert: Wrong! Budapest is the capital of Hungary.
Wrong! Budapest is the capital of Hungary.

questions.question: Which is the capital of Argentina?

answers.alert: Wrong! Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina
Wrong! Buenos Aires is the capital of Argentina
Wrong! The capital of Thailand is Bangkok
Wrong! The capital of Thailand is Bangkok
Wrong! The capital of Lebanon is Beirut
Wrong! The capital of Lebanon is Beirut
